commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: Speaking of dominant, keep your eyes on Connor McDavid tonight. He's got a 15-game point streak going.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: That's right, and on the other side, Aleksander Barkov is always a threat. His two-way game is among the best in the league.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: Both teams boast incredible offensive talent, but it might come down to goaltending tonight. Which team's netminder will stand tall?
